title: A letter written by the King of Nauarre vnto the French King concerning his innocencie against the sclaunders of his aduersaries. Truely translated out of French. Anno 1585.
author: Navarre (Kingdom). Sovereign (1572-1610 : Henry III)
notes: First leaf blank, except for signature "A.j." on recto; last leaf blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
